FuncDef:
The description command configures the description of an attack defense policy.
The undo description command deletes the description of an attack defense policy. The description command configures the description of an attack defense policy. The undo description command deletes the description of an attack defense policy. By default, no description is configured for an attack defense policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specify CPU defend policy description.
It is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters with spaces.

ExtraInfo: The description command configures the description of an attack defense policy, for example, the usage or application scenario of the attack defense policy. The description is used to differentiate attack defense policies.
